name: Snow Plow Truck Driver 3d simulator game
name_original: Snow Plow Truck Driver 3d simulator game
description:
Snow Plow Truck Driver 3D is a unique truck simulator game for those who are fed up of those usual truck driving games.
You’ve got a monstrous snow blower to ride around the city and clear the roads. Solve the ice problem. Make yourself helpful this
winter season for others in this truck driving games.
Snowy climate and icy asphalt roads are very risky and dangerous for driving. Consequently you need to operate heavy equipment like
construction excavators, diggers and cranes. So get ready for a wonderful exciting driving game where you can show off your plowing,
driving and excavating skills.
Drive big rig snow plow automobile to clear city highway road so people can celebrate winter holidays in best way.

Key features:

-Multiple 3D Snowplow Truck engines
-Realistic winter city environment with frozen ice
-Cool winter & snow 3D graphics
-Easy game play & simulation
